title: IThreadFeatureData.Diameter
description: Gets or sets the diameter of the cylindrical face or helix of this thread feature.
returns: 0.0 < Diameter of the helix; default is the diameter of the circular edge specified by IThreadFeatureData::Edge
remarks:
Specify either a value or an equation that starts with an equal sign (=).
This property is valid only if
IThreadFeatureData::DiameterOverride
is set to true.
